dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS) 
WHERE event_name = 'Create Process Order'

SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NULL

SELECT 
count(case_id) FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NOT NULL)
/ 
count(case_id)
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Lead Time: Order Creation -> Order Release

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Released')
-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Create Process Order')
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Lead Time: Order Release -> Order Confirmation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Confirmed')
-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Released')
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate: Goods Issue for order

dataSource.query:
SELECT (count(event_name) 
FILTER(WHERE "Event Created By User Type" NOT IN ('Dialog')))
/
(count(event_name)
)
*100
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE event_name = 'GI for order'

children.name: Lead Time: Order Release -> Goods Receipt

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%')
-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Released')
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG RATE: Delivered Quantity vs. Order Quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
"Produced Delivered Quantity"/"Total Order Quantity")*100  
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Delivery Completed" IS NOT NULL

children.name: Start date: difference planned and actual date
children.description: Average difference planned date vs. actual start date

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: End date: Difference planned and actual date
children.description: AVG Difference Planned vs. Actual end

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Release date: Difference planned and actual date
children.description: Average difference Planned vs. Actual Order Release

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
"Scheduled Release Date" - "Actual Release Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Late Delivery Rate
children.description: Percentage of late delivered orders from total orders

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" > DURATION '0days'))
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL) 
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Early delivery rate
children.description: Percentage of early delivered orders from total orders

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" < DURATION '0days')
    )
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL) 
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: On-time delivery rate
children.description: Percentage of on-time delivered orders from total orders

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER( 
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL AND "Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" = DURATION '0days'
    )
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER( 
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL) 
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Order Release lead Time
children.description: Time from order creation to order release

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name = 'Create Process Order'))
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Order confirmation lead time
children.description: Time from order release to order confirmation

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name = 'Confirmed'))
    -
    (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Manufacturing lead time
children.description: Time from order release to order receipt

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%'))
-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
AVG(
	"Produced Delivered Quantity"/"Total Order Quantity")
	FILTER(WHERE "Delivery Completed" IS NOT NULL)
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(event_name)
    FILTER(WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Confirmed'))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NULL)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Planning Rate
children.description: Process orders with planned order reference vs. total process orders

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NOT NULL)
/ 
COUNT(case_id)
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT SUM((
	SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER(WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%')))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Batch Job','Service') 
        AND event_name IN ('GI for order'))
	)
   ))
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('GI for order')))))
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER(WHERE "Scheduled Release Date" < NOW() 
	AND "Actual Release Date" IS NULL)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER(WHERE "Scheduled Finish Date" < NOW() 
	AND "Actual Delivery Date" IS NULL)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT "Actual Start Date", "Scheduled Start Date", case_id AS "Case ID", 
avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" ) 
--FILTER(WHERE "Actual Start Date" IS NOT NULL)
FROM "defaultview-183"
LIMIT 500

SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date") 
--FILTER(WHERE "Actual Start Date" IS NOT NULL)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
SELECT count(case_id), "Company Code", "Type"  FROM THIS_PROCESS
